text: Juan López Fontana (15 March 1908 – 4 October 1983) was a Uruguayan football manager. He won the 1950 FIFA World Cup as the manager of Uruguay. ==Honours== ===Manager=== Peñarol *Uruguayan Primera División: 1953, 1954 Uruguay *FIFA World Cup: 1950 ==References== ==Other websites== * Short biography Category:1908 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Montevideo Category:Uruguayan football managers Category:Peñarol managers
title: Juan López (football manager, born 1908)
